item.title: Project 3: ML - Shared Bike Demand Prediction
item.description: Abstract : This project tries to predict the bike demand after the ongoing quarantine ends using multiple linear regression model. Business Objective : A bike-sharing system is a service in which bikes are made available for shared use to individuals on a short term basis for a price or free. Many bike share systems allow people to borrow a bike from a “dock” which is usually computer-controlled wherein the user enters the payment information, and the system unlocks it.
